title: Kalista's Rend [E]
body:
I was just going to suggest an idea. 
I realized I would like to see what others think it and if others would like to see it implemented.
I would like it if Kalista's {{champion:429}}  [E] had a counter on it telling you how many rend stacks are in the target she has and considering that Riot were saying that they are contemplating limiting her rend stacks it would make pretty good sense.
Just like Syndra {{champion:134}} with the ball counter on her ult, or even a effect icon above your abilities such as Tides of Blood [E] on Vladmir {{champion:8}} .

replies.body: Well that doesn't work with stacks on multiple targets and would be ultra confusing for those of us that enjoy Runaan's Hurricane on Kalista. What would be better is something like Zed's Death mark shuriken effect that tells you when the mark detonation damage will be fatal to help deal with multiple speared targets.

Technically her rend does have a cap, at 256, so there isn't actually infinite tons of damage. I think an indicator showing when your rend has enough damage to kill a target would be super handy, like Cho'gaths indicator for his ult.

Even without a cap on how many stacks can be applied by Rend it is still limited by attack speed. In fact, with an attack speed of 2.5, you can only get 10-11 stacks on any one enemy. You could say it is effectively capped at 11.

>I would like it if Kalista's [E] had a counter on it telling you how many rend stacks are in the target

Ever tryed actually clicking on your target?
